alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Desha; Drew; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Bradley, southwestern Desha, Drew and south central Lincoln Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Plantersville to near Monticello to 7 miles south of Green Hill. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello... Dumas... Dermott... Tillar... Winchester... Omega... McGehee... Ladelle... Prairie Grove... Reed... Baxter... Gourd... Florence... Enon... Tyro... Selma... Masonville... Yukon... Montongo... New Hope in Drew County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas.
